lessons.lesson: AWK split() returns field count - must use return value instead of NF for split arrays
lessons.context: When parsing ps output with variable fields, NF refers to original line fields, not split array size

lessons.lesson: Node.js processes require args inspection - comm field alone insufficient for detection
lessons.context: Codex runs as 'node' process with '/codex' in command line arguments

lessons.lesson: Use word boundary patterns to prevent false positives in process detection
